title: Help with these 2 fonts
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090411233204im_/http:/typophile.com/files/5ac99de025de5d984cdbe181e8730a1f_6094_3527.jpg)

Name of this font??

&&

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090411233204im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fb7f201f53402b11c428498248601db5_10773_3847.jpg)

this one too

Thanks
author: Diamond

comments.content:
I do not recognize either of these. The “Mother” lettering looks custom, because of the way the letters fit together (at least, the letters were positioned separately, IMHO). “Howdy!” looks like an amateur font effort, maybe from a scrapbooking site. Pizzadude’s (Jakob Fischer) [Dandygal](http://web.archive.org/web/20090411233204/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pizzadude/dandygal/) is similar.

- Mike Yanega
